article.name: Bones, blue bones.
article.description: This cleverly rendered picture is of my kid character, thinned out slightly so you can see through him. I basically rendered this so you can see his bones. Those bones are important! They make him move, they hold him up, they make his skin go where I want it to!
article.keywords: ain't, human, mouse, 3d, model, graphic, texture, 3ds, max, animation, bones, clear, standing, humanoid, view, detail, polygon, animation, walking.
